name: Snowman (itch) (Neuroticfly Games)
description:
Snowman is a short visual novel created for the Winter Visual Novel Jam 2022. It features the story of a man stranded in the middle of nowhere during a blizzard. In his search of a shelter, he found a cottage. What could be waiting for him there?
